New Hampshire primaries are this Tuesday, September 11. No matter whom you vote for, please vote!
  

Dear ##SM_RULE_360 Email Salutation##,

Mark your calendar! The New Hampshire primaries are this Tuesday! Recent elections have demonstrated just how much our civil rights depend on election outcomes. Think of the civil rights issue most important to you — that's your reason to vote. If you are a champion of reproductive rights — vote! If you want to see greater privacy protections in this increasingly technological era — vote! If you want to end mass incarceration — vote!

On Tuesday, we will be voting for governor, congressperson, state senators and representatives, county attorneys, and other local offices.

Find your local polling place.

Sincerely,

ACLU of New Hampshire
